event.title: was arrested at her home Wednesday afternoon

data.event: Patricia Moore, 62, of the 100 block of Howman Avenue, was arrested at her home Wednesday afternoon, March, 25, and charged with criminal trespass and aggravated menacing, according to the Butler County Sheriff's Office.

Patricia Moore, 62, of the 100 block of Howman Avenue, was arrested at her home Wednesday afternoon, March, 25, and charged with criminal trespass and aggravated menacing, according to the Butler County Sheriff's Office.

event.title: took the oath of office in January 2008

data.event: According to the narrative of her arrest, when deputies arrived at her home Moore held out her hands and said, "I did it all and let it be noted when I get out I will find her and kick her ..." Moore was among those who took the oath of office in January 2008 to fill several vacant positions on the village council.

event.title: resigned from her position a few weeks ago

data.event: Moore said she resigned from her position a few weeks ago because of "personal problems with the mayor."
